name: Maximum password age in days
description: The period of time (in days) that a password can be used before the system requires the user to change it. 0 for unlimited.

name: Enforce password history
description: The number of unique new passwords that must be associated with a user account before an old password can be reused.

name: Minimum password length
description: The least number of characters that can make up a password for a user account.

name: Passwords must meet complexity requirements
description: Whether passwords must meet a series of guidelines that are considered important for a strong password.

name: Passwords must be not dictionary word
description: Whether passwords must be not dictionary word.

name: Passwords can match with login
description: Whether passwords can match with login.

name: Account lockout threshold
description: The number of failed sign-in attempts that will cause a user account to be locked.

name: Name of user able to see a security dashboard
description: If this user is logged in all uba_audit events will be mirrored as a webSocket events to a logged in user session(s)
